subject: From the office of:
body:
From the office of:
SENATOR GODSWILL AKPABIO FGN)
Senate President(FRN)
Government of the Federal Republic of Nigeria
Attn:Beneficiary.....................,
RE:PAYMENT APPROVED ENTITLEMENT FUND
This is to notify you that your over due entitlement fund has been gazetted to be released to you after the summit meeting by  Federal Government with the G20 Summit meeting held in New Delhi, India on 10, September 2023.
Your fund now will be paid to you through any of our liason paying banks in America, Asia,Europe e.t.c
We advise that forward to us your full name, address,Phone number 
and any of your passport
.
Truly yours,
SENATOR GODSWILL AKPABIO FGN)
Senate President(FRN)

subject: Re: From the office of:
body:
Hello Senator Godswill Akpabio,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite a surprise to hear about this overdue fund. I'm curious, how did my name come up in relation to this fund? And could you please provide more details about the summit meeting held in New Delhi, India?

I'm also interested in understanding more about the process of receiving these funds through your liaison paying banks. Could you explain how that works?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eddie
